# Tips on running LVHI Liquidator shuttles - Optimal Target Power (kW) for S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is 16 [bold]kW[/bold]. If you've added additional machines, check APC unit to see shuttle's power draw and adjust generator Target Power accordingly. For more general info on power grid see guidebook article [textlink="Power" link="Power"]. - Shuttle atmos waste loop doesn't vent filtered gases into space, instead waste gases are collected in storage canister. Make sure to keep an eye on storage canister pressure and if need be vent it manually in space. Alternatively, accumulated waste gases can be used for refilling jet packs. For more general info on atmospherics see guidebook article about [textlink="Atmospherics" link="Atmospherics"]. - For basics of shuttle piloting see [textlink="Piloting" link="Piloting"].
